This is an R Markdown document describing the data used for the Getting & Cleaning Data course project.

# Label Descriptions


### ACTIVITY & Activity.Type

Code for each activity and the Activity.Type associated with it.

1 WALKING

2 WALKING_UPSTAIRS

3 WALKING_DOWNSTAIRS

4 SITTING

5 STANDING

6 LAYING

### SUBJECT

Each row identifies the subject who performed the activity for each window sample. Its range is 1-30. 


### OTHER COLUMNS

These describe the means and standard deviation for the measurements.

tBodyAcc.mean.X, tBodyAcc.mean.Y, tBodyAcc.mean.Z
tBodyAcc.std.X, tBodyAcc.std.Y, tBodyAcc.std.Z


```{r, echo=FALSE}

```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
